class App{constructor(){this.foods=[{id:1,name:"兰州牛肉拉面",category:"面食",location:"梅川路近真光路",rating:4.3,reviews:127,image:"https://via.placeholder.com/300x200",description:"正宗兰州拉面，汤清面劲，牛肉香浓，学生最爱的平价美食"},{id:2,name:"华莱士",category:"快餐",location:"真光路梅川路口",rating:4.1,reviews:89,image:"https://via.placeholder.com/300x200",description:"平价汉堡薯条，学生聚餐首选，性价比很高"},{id:3,name:"蜜雪冰城",category:"饮品",location:"梅川路商业街",rating:4.6,reviews:156,image:"https://via.placeholder.com/300x200",description:"柠檬水和冰淇淋超赞，价格便宜，学生党最爱"},{id:4,name:"沙县小吃",category:"小吃",location:"真光路",rating:4.2,reviews:78,image:"https://via.placeholder.com/300x200",description:"经典的沙县三宝，拌面蒸饺炖罐，便宜实惠管饱"},{id:5,name:"正新鸡排",category:"小吃",location:"梅川路步行街",rating:4.4,reviews:134,image:"https://via.placeholder.com/300x200",description:"现炸鸡排，外酥内嫩，各种口味选择多"},{id:6,name:"桂林米粉",category:"面食",location:"真北路",rating:4.0,reviews:65,image:"https://via.placeholder.com/300x200",description:"地道桂林米粉，酸辣开胃，汤头鲜美"},{id:7,name:"书亦烧仙草",category:"饮品",location:"梅川路",rating:4.5,reviews:92,image:"https://via.placeholder.com/300x200",description:"烧仙草和奶茶都很棒，配料丰富，颜值很高"},{id:8,name:"煎饼果子摊",category:"早餐",location:"学校门口",rating:4.7,reviews:203,image:"https://via.placeholder.com/300x200",description:"早餐必选，现做现卖，香脆可口，老板手艺好"},{id:9,name:"麦当劳",category:"快餐",location:"真如副中心",rating:4.2,reviews:245,image:"https://via.placeholder.com/300x200",description:"经典快餐，环境舒适，适合聚会学习"},{id:10,name:"老盛昌汤包",category:"小吃",location:"真光路",rating:4.3,reviews:118,image:"https://via.placeholder.com/300x200",description:"上海老字号，汤包皮薄汁多，还有各种馄饨面条"},{id:11,name:"重庆小面",category:"面食",location:"梅川路",rating:4.1,reviews:87,image:"https://via.placeholder.com/300x200",description:"麻辣鲜香的重庆小面，口味正宗，分量足"},{id:12,name:"一点点奶茶",category:"饮品",location:"真如商圈",rating:4.6,reviews:167,image:"https://via.placeholder.com/300x200",description:"台式奶茶品牌，波霸奶茶和四季春茶特别受欢迎"}];this.init();}init(){this.render();this.bindEvents();}render(){const root=document.getElementById('root');root.innerHTML=`

🍔 曹杨二中周边美食评分

发现真光路·梅川路商圈最好吃的美食！

${this.renderFoodCards()}
×

添加美食评价

`;}renderFoodCards(){return this.foods.map(food=>`

${food.name}

${food.category}

📍 ${food.location}

${this.renderStars(food.rating)} ${food.rating} (${food.reviews}条评价)

${food.description}

`).join('');}renderStars(rating){const fullStars=Math.floor(rating);const hasHalfStar=rating%1!==0;let starsHTML='';for(let i=0;ithis.handleSearch());searchInput.addEventListener('keypress',e=>{if(e.key==='Enter'){this.handleSearch();}});// 筛选功能 const filterBtns=document.querySelectorAll('.filter-btn');filterBtns.forEach(btn=>{btn.addEventListener('click',e=>{filterBtns.forEach(b=>b.classList.remove('active'));e.target.classList.add('active');this.handleFilter(e.target.dataset.category);});});// 添加评价模态框 const addReviewBtn=document.getElementById('addReviewBtn');const modal=document.getElementById('reviewModal');const closeBtn=document.querySelector('.close');const reviewForm=document.getElementById('reviewForm');addReviewBtn.addEventListener('click',()=>{modal.style.display='block';});closeBtn.addEventListener('click',()=>{modal.style.display='none';});window.addEventListener('click',e=>{if(e.target===modal){modal.style.display='none';}});reviewForm.addEventListener('submit',e=>{e.preventDefault();this.handleAddReview(e);});}handleSearch(){const searchTerm=document.getElementById('searchInput').value.toLowerCase();const foodCards=document.querySelectorAll('.food-card');foodCards.forEach(card=>{const foodName=card.querySelector('.food-name').textContent.toLowerCase();const foodCategory=card.querySelector('.food-category').textContent.toLowerCase();const foodLocation=card.querySelector('.food-location').textContent.toLowerCase();if(foodName.includes(searchTerm)||foodCategory.includes(searchTerm)||foodLocation.includes(searchTerm)){card.style.display='block';}else{card.style.display='none';}});}handleFilter(category){const foodCards=document.querySelectorAll('.food-card');foodCards.forEach(card=>{if(category==='all'||card.dataset.category===category){card.style.display='block';}else{card.style.display='none';}});}handleAddReview(e){const formData=new FormData(e.target);const newFood={id:Date.now(),name:formData.get('name'),category:formData.get('category'),location:formData.get('location'),rating:parseFloat(formData.get('rating')),reviews:1,image:"https://via.placeholder.com/300x200",description:formData.get('description')};this.foods.push(newFood);document.getElementById('foodGrid').innerHTML=this.renderFoodCards();document.getElementById('reviewModal').style.display='none';e.target.reset();// 重新绑定事件（因为DOM重新渲染了） this.bindEvents();alert('谢谢分享！你的美食推荐已经添加成功！');}}// 启动应用 document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',()=>{new App();});
